title: 十幾年前去過東京迪士尼樂園，而家仲值唔值得再去？

replies.msg:
無記錯的話，2005年去過
值唔值得再去？

Of course. By the way, in Tokyo, it's been raining on and off all day. In Kyoto, it's just spitting a little. In Osaka, it's spitting too. In Kagoshima, it's pouring. In Miyazaki, it's pouring rain outside. In Okinawa, it's really coming down out there.
In Tokyo, it was sunny earlier but now, it's pouring.
